description.zh-cn: 秦末汉初名将，与韩信、彭越并称汉初三大名将。先随项羽，后叛楚归汉，封为淮南王。后因畏惧异姓王被清算而起兵反汉，兵败被杀。
description.en: A prominent general during the late Qin dynasty and early Han dynasty, known as one of the three great generals of the early Han, along with Han Xin and Peng Yue. Initially a subordinate of Xiang Yu, he later defected to the Han and was enfeoffed as the King of Huainan. He later rebelled against the Han out of fear of the purge of non-imperial kings and was defeated and killed.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的开国皇帝，即汉高祖。在楚汉战争中击败项羽，建立了汉朝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han dynasty, known as Emperor Gaozu of Han. He defeated Xiang Yu in the Chu–Han Contention and established the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 秦末民变领袖，西楚的建立者与唯一君主，被后人称为“西楚霸王”。
description.en: A rebel leader during the late Qin dynasty, the founder and sole monarch of Western Chu, posthumously known as the 'Hegemon-King of Western Chu'.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的长沙王，为吴芮之子，英布的妻舅。他诱杀了逃亡中的英布。
description.en: King of Changsha during the Western Han dynasty, son of Wu Rui, and brother-in-law of Ying Bu. He lured and assassinated the fugitive Ying Bu.

description.zh-cn: 英布的部下，任淮南中大夫。因与英布产生嫌隙，逃往长安告发英布谋反。
description.en: A subordinate of Ying Bu, serving as a Grand Master of the Palace in Huainan. Due to a rift with Ying Bu, he fled to Chang'an and accused Ying Bu of plotting a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦的谋士与说客，成功说服英布背叛项羽，归降汉朝。
description.en: An advisor and lobbyist for Liu Bang who successfully persuaded Ying Bu to betray Xiang Yu and surrender to the Han.

description.zh-cn: 秦末时期被项梁拥立的楚国君主，后被尊为“义帝”，最终被项羽派人杀害。
description.en: The monarch of the Chu state, installed by Xiang Liang during the late Qin dynasty. He was later honored as 'Emperor Yi' and was eventually assassinated under Xiang Yu's orders.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后。在刘邦死后，她临朝称制，是汉初政坛的核心人物。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang. After Liu Bang's death, she ruled as regent and was a central figure in early Han politics.

description.zh-cn: 汉初三大名将之一，为刘邦夺取天下立下赫赫战功，后被吕后设计诛杀。
description.en: One of the three great generals of the early Han dynasty, who made significant contributions to Liu Bang's conquest. He was later executed through a plot by Empress Lü.

description.zh-cn: 汉初三大名将之一，封为梁王，后被吕后以谋反罪名诛杀并处以醢刑。
description.en: One of the three great generals of the early Han dynasty, enfeoffed as the King of Liang. He was later executed by Empress Lü on charges of treason and his body was pickled.

description.zh-cn: 秦末民变领袖，与吴广共同发动大泽之变，建立了“张楚”政权。
description.en: A rebel leader during the late Qin dynasty who, along with Wu Guang, initiated the Dazexiang Uprising and established the 'Zhangchu' regime.

description.zh-cn: 项羽的叔父，秦末重要的民变领袖之一，在定陶之役中战死。
description.en: The uncle of Xiang Yu and a major rebel leader during the late Qin dynasty. He was killed in the Battle of Dingtao.

description.zh-cn: 楚国上将军，在北上救赵途中被项羽刺杀。
description.en: The supreme general of the Chu forces, who was assassinated by Xiang Yu while on the way to rescue the Zhao state.

description.zh-cn: 西楚霸王项羽麾下重要将领。
description.en: An important general serving under Xiang Yu, the Hegemon-King of Western Chu.

description.zh-cn: 西楚将领，曾与龙且一同进攻反叛的英布。
description.en: A general of Western Chu who, along with Long Qie, attacked the rebellious Ying Bu.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝宗室，被封为荆王。在英布反叛时被其击败并杀害。
description.en: A member of the Han imperial clan, enfeoffed as the King of Jing. He was defeated and killed by Ying Bu during the latter's rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 原为西楚大司马，后在垓下之战前夕被诱降，反叛楚国并加入了汉军。
description.en: Originally the Grand Marshal of Western Chu, he was persuaded to surrender on the eve of the Battle of Gaixia, betraying Chu and joining the Han forces.

description.zh-cn: 原楚国令尹，在英布谋反时，为刘邦分析了英布可能采取的战略，并准确预测其会采取下策。
description.en: The former prime minister of the Chu state. When Ying Bu rebelled, he analyzed the potential strategies for Liu Bang and accurately predicted that Ying Bu would choose the worst option.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国功臣，时任齐国相国。在英布谋反时，率领齐军参与了对英布的夹击。
description.en: A founding father of the Han dynasty, serving as the Chancellor of the Qi Kingdom at the time. During Ying Bu's rebellion, he led the Qi army to join the pincer attack against Ying Bu.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上第一个大一统的帝国，由秦始皇建立。
description.en: The first unified empire in Chinese history, established by Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝末年由项羽建立的政权。
description.en: A regime established by Xiang Yu at the end of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由汉高祖刘邦建立的中国朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝初年，刘邦及其妻吕后为巩固皇权，对异姓诸侯王进行的一系列削藩、翦除行动。
description.en: A series of actions in the early Han dynasty, led by Liu Bang and his wife Empress Lü, to weaken and eliminate the vassal kings who did not share the imperial surname, in order to consolidate imperial power.

description.zh-cn: 楚汉战争的最后一场决定性战役，项羽在此战中兵败，最终自刎于乌江。
description.en: The final and decisive battle of the Chu–Han Contention, where Xiang Yu was defeated and ultimately committed suicide at the Wu River.

description.zh-cn: 英布的家乡，位于今安徽省六安市。
description.en: Ying Bu's hometown, located in modern-day Lu'an, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 英布的逝世地点，位于今江西省景德镇市西南。
description.en: The place of Ying Bu's death, located southwest of modern-day Jingdezhen, Jiangxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 在秦末民变初期，英布曾是张楚王陈胜的下属。
description.en: In the early stages of the rebellions at the end of the Qin dynasty, Ying Bu was a subordinate of Chen Sheng, the King of Zhangchu.

description.zh-cn: 陈胜败死后，英布归附项梁。
description.en: After Chen Sheng's defeat and death, Ying Bu became a subordinate of Xiang Liang.

description.zh-cn: 项梁战死后，英布归属于项羽指挥，并成为其麾下骁勇善战的先锋大将。
description.en: After Xiang Liang was killed in battle, Ying Bu came under the command of Xiang Yu and became a valiant vanguard general under him.

description.zh-cn: 在随何的游说下，英布叛离项羽，归顺刘邦。
description.en: Persuaded by Sui He, Ying Bu defected from Xiang Yu and submitted to Liu Bang.

description.zh-cn: 英布年轻时因触犯秦朝法律而被处以黥刑。
description.en: In his youth, Ying Bu was sentenced to the punishment of tattooing on the face for violating the laws of the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 因畏惧被清算，英布于前196年起兵反叛汉朝。
description.en: Fearing a purge, Ying Bu launched a rebellion against the Han dynasty in 196 BC.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦御驾亲征，击败了反叛的英布。
description.en: Liu Bang personally led the campaign and defeated the rebellious Ying Bu.

description.zh-cn: 英布的妻舅、长沙王吴臣设计诱捕并刺杀了兵败逃亡的英布。
description.en: Ying Bu's brother-in-law, Wu Chen, the King of Changsha, plotted to entrap and assassinate Ying Bu after his defeat and flight.

description.zh-cn: 与英布产生嫌隙后，贲赫逃往长安，向刘邦告发英布意图谋反，直接导致了英布的叛乱和败亡。
description.en: After a falling out with Ying Bu, Ben He fled to Chang'an and reported to Liu Bang that Ying Bu was plotting a rebellion, directly leading to Ying Bu's revolt and downfall.

description.zh-cn: 项羽分封十八路诸侯时，因英布战功卓著，立其为九江王。
description.en: When Xiang Yu enfeoffed the Eighteen Princes, he made Ying Bu the King of Jiujiang due to his outstanding military achievements.

description.zh-cn: 英布归汉后，刘邦于前203年七月封其为淮南王。
description.en: After Ying Bu surrendered to Han, Liu Bang enfeoffed him as the King of Huainan in the seventh month of 203 BC.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦派遣的说客随何成功游说英布，使其背叛项羽，归降汉朝。
description.en: Sui He, a lobbyist dispatched by Liu Bang, successfully persuaded Ying Bu to betray Xiang Yu and surrender to the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 项羽暗中命令英布等人截击并杀害了已被尊为义帝的楚怀王熊心。
description.en: Xiang Yu secretly ordered Ying Bu and others to intercept and assassinate Xiong Xin, the former King Huai of Chu, who had been honored as Emperor Yi.

description.zh-cn: 在北上救赵途中，项羽发动兵变，刺杀了上将军宋义，夺取了军队的控制权。
description.en: On the way north to rescue the state of Zhao, Xiang Yu staged a mutiny and assassinated the supreme general Song Yi, seizing control of the army.

description.zh-cn: 汉初，吕后等人先后诛杀韩信、彭越等异姓王，这使得英布深感恐惧，最终选择起兵反叛以求自保。
description.en: In the early Han dynasty, Empress Lü and others successively executed non-imperial kings like Han Xin and Peng Yue. This caused Ying Bu great fear, leading him to rebel in an attempt at self-preservation.

description.zh-cn: 汉高帝十一年，吕后（高后）设计诛杀了淮阴侯韩信。
description.en: In the eleventh year of Emperor Gaozu's reign (196 BC), Empress Lü (Gaohou) plotted and executed Han Xin, the Marquis of Huaiyin.

description.zh-cn: 在诛杀韩信同年，吕后又以谋反罪名处死了梁王彭越，并将其尸体施以醢刑。
description.en: In the same year as Han Xin's execution, Empress Lü also executed Peng Yue, the King of Liang, on charges of treason and had his body pickled.

description.zh-cn: 英布背叛西楚后，项羽派龙且、项声进攻淮南，并击败了英布的军队。
description.en: After Ying Bu betrayed Western Chu, Xiang Yu sent Long Qie and Xiang Sheng to attack Huainan, and they defeated Ying Bu's army.

description.zh-cn: 英布背叛西楚后，项羽派项声、龙且进攻淮南，并击败了英布的军队。
description.en: After Ying Bu betrayed Western Chu, Xiang Yu sent Xiang Sheng and Long Qie to attack Huainan, and they defeated Ying Bu's army.

description.zh-cn: 在垓下之战前，原楚国大司马周殷被刘贾和英布诱降，反叛楚国。
description.en: Before the Battle of Gaixia, Zhou Yin, the Grand Marshal of Chu, was persuaded by Liu Jia and Ying Bu to surrender and rebel against the state of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 英布率领其军队会合其他汉军，参与了对项羽的最终决战——垓下之战。
description.en: Ying Bu led his troops to join other Han forces and participated in the final decisive battle against Xiang Yu, the Battle of Gaixia.

description.zh-cn: 项羽在垓下之战中被汉军重重围困，最终兵败，导致其自刎身亡。
description.en: Xiang Yu was heavily besieged by the Han forces in the Battle of Gaixia, which led to his defeat and eventual suicide.

description.zh-cn: 英布起兵反汉后，首先东击荆国，荆王刘贾不敌，在逃亡途中被英布军杀害。
description.en: After rebelling against Han, Ying Bu first attacked the state of Jing. The King of Jing, Liu Jia, was defeated and killed by Ying Bu's forces while fleeing.

description.zh-cn: 在刘邦与英布会战时，时任齐相国的曹参率领齐军赶到，对英布军进行了夹击，加速了其失败。
description.en: During the battle between Liu Bang and Ying Bu, Cao Shen, then Chancellor of Qi, arrived with the Qi army and launched a pincer attack on Ying Bu's forces, hastening his defeat.

description.zh-cn: 在英布反叛后，薛鉴为刘邦分析了英布可能采用的上、中、下三策，并准确预测英布会出下策，为刘邦决策提供了重要参考。
description.en: After Ying Bu's rebellion, Xue Jian analyzed the three potential strategies (best, middle, and worst) for Liu Bang and accurately predicted that Ying Bu would choose the worst one, providing a crucial reference for Liu Bang's decision-making.

description.zh-cn: 根据史书记载，英布是六县人。
description.en: According to historical records, Ying Bu was a native of Liu County.
